WHO Length/height-for-age for boys

Source: R/data.R
who_lgth_ht_for_age_boys.Rd

WHO Length/height-for-age charts for boys from day 0 (birth) to day 1856

Usage

who_lgth_ht_for_age_boys

Format

A data frame with 1857 rows and 4 variables:

Day

Age in days

L

Box-Cox transformation for normality

M

Median

S

Coefficient of variation

Source

https://www.who.int/tools/child-growth-standards/standards/length-height-for-age

See also

Metadata cdc_bmiage, cdc_htage, cdc_wtage, derive_interp_records(), who_bmi_for_age_boys, who_bmi_for_age_girls, who_hc_for_age_boys, who_hc_for_age_girls, who_lgth_ht_for_age_girls, who_wt_for_age_boys, who_wt_for_age_girls, who_wt_for_lgth_boys, who_wt_for_lgth_girls
